OrgName: Xerox Business Services, LLC, and all wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries
activities:
Xerox Business Services, LLC. and its wholly-owned U.S. subsidiaries (XBS) collect, store and process certain personal information in the United States about client contacts, employees, and their dependents and beneficiaries in the European Union and Switzerland (“European Personal Information”).  Specifically, XBS may receive and process European Personal Information about client contacts and other visitors to its website who purchase, or may purchase, products or services from XBS on behalf of their companies (“Client Contact Data”).  

XBS also receives certain European Personal Information about client employees, beneficiaries, dependents, customers and others in connection with the provision of information technology, business process management, and related services to its clients (“Client Controlled Data”).  XBS acts as a data processor with respect to the handling and processing of the Client Controlled Data, and in accordance with its client’s instructions.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: EU data protection authorities (DPAs) and Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC)
